languages.text: Гордость Сантиэля была обескровлена и разграблена друкари. Даже светило этой звездной системы было похищено ими.
Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.
languages.original_text: Гордость Сантиэля была обескровлена и разграблена друкари. Даже светило этой звездной системы было похищено ими.

traits.locale_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.
Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.
Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.
Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

languages.text: La Gloire de Santiel a été dépouillée par les pillards drukharis. Même l'étoile du système a été dérobée.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

traits.locale_text: La Gloire de Santiel a été dépouillée par les pillards drukharis. Même l'étoile du système a été dérobée.

languages.text: 桑提尔之傲被黑暗灵族入侵者榨干，劫掠一空，就连这个星系的恒星都被盗走了。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

traits.locale_text: 桑提尔之傲被黑暗灵族入侵者榨干，劫掠一空，就连这个星系的恒星都被盗走了。

languages.text: サンティエル・プライドはデュカーリのレイダーによりすべてを奪われ、荒らされていた。星系の星すら盗み出されてしまったのだ。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

traits.locale_text: サンティエル・プライドはデュカーリのレイダーによりすべてを奪われ、荒らされていた。星系の星すら盗み出されてしまったのだ。

languages.text: Santiels Stolz wurde von den Drukhari-Angreifern ausgeblutet und geplündert. Selbst den Stern des Systems haben sie gestohlen.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

traits.locale_text: Santiels Stolz wurde von den Drukhari-Angreifern ausgeblutet und geplündert. Selbst den Stern des Systems haben sie gestohlen.

languages.text: Los incursores Drukhari han saqueado Orgullo de Santiel a conciencia. Se han llevado hasta la estrella del sistema.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.

traits.locale_text: Los incursores Drukhari han saqueado Orgullo de Santiel a conciencia. Se han llevado hasta la estrella del sistema.

languages.text: Santiel'in Gururu, Drukhari baskıncılar tarafından yağmalanmış ve kurutulmuş. Sistemin yıldızı bile çalınmış.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride was bled dry and despoiled by the Drukhari raiders. Even the system's star was stolen.
